tasks.label: Build KAOS
tasks.command: docker run --rm -v "${workspaceFolder}:/src" sqlpassion/kaos-buildenv /bin/sh /src/main64/build.sh && qemu-img convert -O qcow2 ${workspaceFolder}/main64/kaos64.img ${workspaceFolder}/main64/kaos64.qcow2 && cp ${workspaceFolder}/main64/kaos64.qcow2 "$HOME/Library/Containers/com.utmapp.UTM/Data/Documents/KAOS x64.utm/Data/kaos64.qcow2" && qemu-system-x86_64 -drive format=raw,file=${workspaceFolder}/main64/kaos64.img -s -S

tasks.label: Build & Debug KAOS Rust
tasks.command: ${workspaceFolder}/main64/build_rust.sh && qemu-img convert -O qcow2 ${workspaceFolder}/main64/kaos64_rust.img ${workspaceFolder}/main64/kaos64.qcow2 && cp ${workspaceFolder}/main64/kaos64.qcow2 "$HOME/Library/Containers/com.utmapp.UTM/Data/Documents/KAOS x64.utm/Data/kaos64.qcow2" && qemu-system-x86_64 -drive format=raw,file=${workspaceFolder}/main64/kaos64_rust.img -s -S
